MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick, affecting properties in Henderson Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.35pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:10pm on 30th October 2020.
